name: Deiland
description: Deiland is a single-player adventure RPG with several sandbox elements, such as farming, crafting, and building. Put on the mantle of the Little Prince of Deiland and rule over your own planet!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel Celeron G1820 / AMD Athlon II X3 455 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 430/ AMD Radeon R5 240 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7850 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
